gameInfo.line4: Everything free of charge with no ads

shop.title: Shop
shop.content: Finish games destroying as much enemies as you can to receive coins and spend them to expand your character's possibilities

socialChat.title: Social chat
socialChat.content: Invite some friends and chat with them privately even in a middle of gameplay

rankings.title: Rankings
rankings.content: Gain rank and experience from playing games and climb up in global ranking

logInInvitation: Log in now to get access to all features
